title: Jd, Tides of Invention

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose someone to whirl at night. Each of their night messages will be replaced with a night message from another role chosen at random.
**Cascade of Imagination** â€” Scramble all non-Mafia players' night messages at random. Then, make all of those night messages true. You may only use this ability once each game and you can't use it until Night 3.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have an impenetrable forcefield that prevents the first two attacks that would be dealt to you.

desc:
Post 2041
*Within the tides of Chaos, only one side shall reign supreme. Unleashed by the flames, of the Mafia.*
